snippet.title: Candidates 2024 | Gukesh, Pragg, VD, Humpy, Vaishali | Rd 12 | Live: GM RB Ramesh, Amruta, Sagar
snippet.description:
A Supergrandmaster's Guide to Openings by Anish Giri: https://chessbase.in/online-shop#!/A-Supergrandmasters-Guide-to-Openings-Vol-1-&-2-by-Anish-Giri-Pre-Order/p/647004877/category=0

FIDE has launched their own shop celebrating 100 years of existence! Get your favourite products now - https://shop.fide.com/ - use coupon code CHESSBASE for 10% discount.

ChessBase 17 + Mega Database 2024 Combo - our bestseller: https://chessbase.in/online-shop#!/ChessBase-17-Mega-Database-2024-Combo/p/601221467

Get the new ChessPa Activity Books: https://chessbase.in/online-shop#!/ChessPa-Activity-Books/p/603903576

ChessBase India Premium Chess set: https://chessbase.in/online-shop#!/ChessBase-India-Premium-Chess-Set/p/376637361

Indian super GMs combo: https://chessbase.in/online-shop#!/Indian-Super-GM-combos/p/615237326

Join us live as chess history unfolds in Toronto, Canada! The 2024 Candidates Tournament brings together the world's top players, vying for a shot at the prestigious World Championship title. Witness intense battles and strategic masterpieces as these chess elite compete in a thrilling double round-robin format. Don't miss a moment of the action as the Great Hall becomes the battleground for this epic clash of minds. Tune in now and be part of the excitement!

Contribute here if you wish to help a chess player! https://helpchess.org/#believer 

Pairings- Round 12:

Open
Hikaru Nakamura- Alireza Firouzja
Nijat Abasov - Gukesh D
Fabiano Caruana - Vidit Santosh Gujrathi
Ian Nepomniachtchi - Praggnanandhaa R

Women’s
Kateryna Lagno - Lei Tingjie
Anna Muzychuk - Vaishali Rameshbabu
Aleksandra Goryachkina - Humpy Koneru
Nurgyul Salimova - Tan Zhongyi
